header.title: The best fence installation company in Mountain View
bullets: FREE online tool to create your own custom quote.
Friendly, honest customer service from our Ergeon team!
Beautiful fence built by our skilled local contractors.

Yelp.description: Much appreciated the contact-free quote via google meet during the pandemic. Then the work itself was executed quickly and so well done. Fence looks like new again (posts were all replaced). And the cost was very competitive. Definitely recommend them!
Yelp.name: Annette H.
Yelp.title: The work was executed quickly and so well done.

Google.description: Troy from Ergeon was thorough and professional. He called to get the specifics for our fence replacement and then conducted a video call so he could see the actual fence line. He provided a quote quickly which showed attention to detail using the materials we’d requested. He was very patient and helpful through the whole process!
Google.name: Ellen M.
Google.title: Troy from Ergeon was thorough and professional.

faq.setback: 5 feet from the side property line (a side property line is often located 3 to 5 feet from the back edge of the sidewalk)
faq.corner-lot-rules: 3 feet max height on 35 feet traffic visibility triangle

articles.description: If you’re looking to get a new fence in California, it’s important to know about the laws surrounding fences and home improvement projects. Our post will go over some important things to keep in mind.

When it’s time to get a new fence it’s important to always use a reputable, licensed, and insured contractor. Some people try to cut costs by using unlicensed contractors, but this can end up being a major issue if any problems happen during the installation or down the line. In this post, we’ll go over the main reasons why you should always use a licensed and insured fence contractor.

There’s a lot to consider when weighing the pros and cons of a wood fence versus a chain link fence. We’ve tried to make the process easier for you by diving deeper into some of the areas of consideration.
